content.text:
I don't have the ability to search the web. However, I can tell you that based on historical records, the last US penny minted for circulation was in 2022. The US Mint ceased regular penny production after 2022.

If you need the exact date in yyyy-mm-dd format, that would be difficult to provide with precision since the US Mint doesn't typically release an exact single date for when the last penny of a year was minted - it's an ongoing production process throughout the year. The last year pennies were minted was 2022, but I cannot provide a specific day in yyyy-mm-dd format without access to current information.

However, I should note: I don't actually have real-time web search capabilities. If you need the most current and accurate information, I'd recommend checking the official US Mint website.
